message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go below $11,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $11,500 is closer to my budget, I still cannot exceed $10,000. Would you be open to discussing this further?
